definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: "Be clean!" And immediately the leprosy left him.
sentences.chinese: 大麻疯立刻就离了他的身。

sentences.english: I recognized his voice at once.
sentences.chinese: 我立刻听出了他的口音。

sentences.english: I'll call right now to find it out.
An international radiotelephone signal word used by aircraft and ships in distress.
sentences.chinese: 遇险后，船员立刻发出求救信号。

sentences.english: Doris:I think because I turned on the air conditioner right after showering and before I blow-dried my hair.
sentences.chinese: 大概是我刚刚洗完澡没吹头发又立刻开冷气的关系吧。

sentences.english: Some girls sprang up a dance immediately, other of just stand the side of the side confabulation see.

sentences.english: The moment that you would see their body language change.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到他们的身体语言立刻改变了。

sentences.english: Had the policemen arrived immediately, the criminal would have been caught.
sentences.chinese: 若是警察立刻到，就会抓获罪犯。

sentences.english: The horse's ears cocked up immediately.
An insistently disapproving expression came upon her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上立刻露出了不同意的表情。

sentences.english: As soon as the captain heard the sound of the lock being turned, he stepped forward.
sentences.chinese: 一听到锁的转动声，船长就立刻一步跨世上前去。

sentences.english: Then she ran to the pay-phone to call the polices.
sentences.chinese: 她立刻跑到投币电话亭，打电话报警。

sentences.english: Here he let the Enchanted Horse come to the ground, but he did not at once enter the city.
sentences.chinese: 才把马降落在地上，但并没有立刻进城去。

sentences.english: The kid knows okay, he's not going to get it right away, he's going to keep on asking.
sentences.chinese: 孩子明白，他不会立刻成功，所以他就不停的问下去。

sentences.english: Collect mulberry day asks to show autopsy to Limeng immediately.

sentences.english: At this, he instantly let me go, and I ran for my life.
sentences.chinese: 听到这话，他立刻放开了我，我于是拼命逃跑。

in the first moments (of sth happening)/immediately (after an event)/first thing
in a short while/all at once/all of a sudden
